author: mklement0
body:
Fix #3786

The appropriate [SemanticVersion] constructor now accepts a [version] instance that has only major and minor components specified, in which case the patch component now defaults to 0.

If you are not from the PowerShell Team, you can leave the fields blank and the Maintainers will choose them for you. If you are familiar with the team, feel free to mention some Reviewers yourself.

For more information about the roles of Reviewer and Assignee, refer to CONTRIBUTING.md.

-->

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Did you mean to close this? It wasn't merged, and can't be merged now because the branch was deleted.

comments.author: mklement0
comments.body: @lzybkr Sorry, my bad: I though it was already merged.

comments.body: I updated the title and description to conform to our specs.

title: Fix build version handling when creating SemanticVersion objects
